work.title: Team Member && React Specialist
work.description: Teaching ReactJS to thousands of students.

projects.title: GOSHOPAL
projects.category: Goshopal is an e-commerce website builded during a 2-days bootcamp. This website is builded using Python and Django framework.

projects.title: Resulam
projects.category: Resulam is LMS platform builded for African people, I have co-worked on building this platform using Moodle.

projects.title: Netflix Clone
projects.category: Very interactive app that looks pretty much like Netflix, its a Netflix clone builded using React JS framework.

projects.title: Covid-19 Tracker
projects.category: A simple covid-19 tracker app builded using React Js and Disease.sh API. Has a lot of components like map, country list, graph etc.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
